control.controller
Class RegisteredUserController

java.lang.Object
  control.controller.GeneralUserController
      control.controller.RegisteredUserController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AcademicStaffController, AdministratorController
public abstract class RegisteredUserController
extends GeneralUserController

The RegisteredUserController class is an abstract class that extends from GeneralUserController. It provide methods for registered users rather than general users. However, it can not be instantiated since a registered user must use either AdministratorController or AcademicStaffController to operate.

See Also:
GeneralUserController

changePassword

public boolean changePassword(java.lang.String oldPassword,
                              java.lang.String newPassword)
Change the password with newPassword if the passed oldPassword is correct.

Parameters:
oldPassword - The old password, used to check before changing password
newPassword - The new password
Returns:
True if oldPassword is correct. Otherwise, return false.
